verses.verse: So all Israel <WH3478> were reckoned by genealogies <WH3187>; and, behold, they were written <WH3789> in the book <WH5612> of the kings <WH4428> of Israel <WH3478> and Judah <WH3063>, who were carried away <WH1540> to Babylon <WH894> for their transgression <WH4604>.

Now the first <WH7223> inhabitants <WH3427> that dwelt in their possessions <WH272> in their cities <WH5892> were, the Israelites <WH3478>, the priests <WH3548>, Levites <WH3881>, and the Nethinims <WH5411>.

And in Jerusalem <WH3389> dwelt <WH3427> of the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063>, and of the children <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144>, and of the children <WH1121> of Ephraim <WH669>, and Manasseh <WH4519>;

Uthai <WH5793> the son <WH1121> of Ammihud <WH5989>, the son <WH1121> of Omri <WH6018>, the son <WH1121> of Imri <WH566>, the son <WH1121> of Bani <WH1137>, of the children <WH1121> of Pharez <WH6557> the son <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063>.
And of the Shilonites <WH7888>; Asaiah <WH6222> the firstborn <WH1060>, and his sons <WH1121>.
And of the sons <WH1121> of Zerah <WH2226>; Jeuel <WH3262>, and their brethren <WH251>, six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> and ninety <WH8673>.
And of the sons <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144>; Sallu <WH5543> the son <WH1121> of Meshullam <WH4918>, the son <WH1121> of Hodaviah <WH1938>, the son <WH1121> of Hasenuah <WH5574>,

And Ibneiah <WH2997> the son <WH1121> of Jeroham <WH3395>, and Elah <WH425> the son <WH1121> of Uzzi <WH5813>, the son <WH1121> of Michri <WH4381>, and Meshullam <WH4918> the son <WH1121> of Shephathiah <WH8203>, the son <WH1121> of Reuel <WH7467>, the son <WH1121> of Ibnijah <WH2998>;

And their brethren <WH251>, according to their generations <WH8435>, nine <WH8672> hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> and six <WH8337>. All these men <WH582> were chief <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1> in the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1>.
And of the priests <WH3548>; Jedaiah <WH3048>, and Jehoiarib <WH3080>, and Jachin <WH3199>,

And Azariah <WH5838> the son <WH1121> of Hilkiah <WH2518>, the son <WH1121> of Meshullam <WH4918>, the son <WH1121> of Zadok <WH6659>, the son <WH1121> of Meraioth <WH4812>, the son <WH1121> of Ahitub <WH285>, the ruler <WH5057> of the house <WH1004> of God <WH430>;

And Adaiah <WH5718> the son <WH1121> of Jeroham <WH3395>, the son <WH1121> of Pashur <WH6583>, the son <WH1121> of Malchijah <WH4441>, and Maasiai <WH4640> the son <WH1121> of Adiel <WH5717>, the son <WH1121> of Jahzerah <WH3170>, the son <WH1121> of Meshullam <WH4918>, the son <WH1121> of Meshillemith <WH4921>, the son <WH1121> of Immer <WH564>;

And their brethren <WH251>, heads <WH7218> of the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1>, a thousand <WH505> and seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967> and threescore <WH8346>; very able <WH2428> men <WH1368> for the work <WH4399> of the service <WH5656> of the house <WH1004> of God <WH430>. very: Heb. mighty men of valour

And of the Levites <WH3881>; Shemaiah <WH8098> the son <WH1121> of Hasshub <WH2815>, the son <WH1121> of Azrikam <WH5840>, the son <WH1121> of Hashabiah <WH2811>, of the sons <WH1121> of Merari <WH4847>;
And Bakbakkar <WH1230>, Heresh <WH2792>, and Galal <WH1559>, and Mattaniah <WH4983> the son <WH1121> of Micah <WH4316>, the son <WH1121> of Zichri <WH2147>, the son <WH1121> of Asaph <WH623>;

And Obadiah <WH5662> the son <WH1121> of Shemaiah <WH8098>, the son <WH1121> of Galal <WH1559>, the son <WH1121> of Jeduthun <WH3038>, and Berechiah <WH1296> the son <WH1121> of Asa <WH609>, the son <WH1121> of Elkanah <WH511>, that dwelt <WH3427> in the villages <WH2691> of the Netophathites <WH5200>.
And the porters <WH7778> were, Shallum <WH7967>, and Akkub <WH6126>, and Talmon <WH2929>, and Ahiman <WH289>, and their brethren <WH251>: Shallum <WH7967> was the chief <WH7218>;
Who hitherto waited in the king's <WH4428> gate <WH8179> eastward <WH4217>: they were porters <WH7778> in the companies <WH4264> of the children <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878>.

And Shallum <WH7967> the son <WH1121> of Kore <WH6981>, the son <WH1121> of Ebiasaph <WH43>, the son <WH1121> of Korah <WH7141>, and his brethren <WH251>, of the house <WH1004> of his father <WH1>, the Korahites <WH7145>, were over the work <WH4399> of the service <WH5656>, keepers <WH8104> of the gates <WH5592> of the tabernacle <WH168>: and their fathers <WH1>, being over the host <WH4264> of the LORD <WH3068>, were keepers <WH8104> of the entry <WH3996>. gates: Heb. thresholds
And Phinehas <WH6372> the son <WH1121> of Eleazar <WH499> was the ruler <WH5057> over them in time past <WH6440>, and the LORD <WH3068> was with him.
And Zechariah <WH2148> the son <WH1121> of Meshelemiah <WH4920> was porter <WH7778> of the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150>.

All these which were chosen <WH1305> to be porters <WH7778> in the gates <WH5592> were two hundred <WH3967> and twelve <WH8147> <WH6240>. These were reckoned by their genealogy <WH3187> in their villages <WH2691>, whom <WH1992> David <WH1732> and Samuel <WH8050> the seer <WH7200> did ordain <WH3245> in their set office <WH530>. did: Heb. founded set: or, trust
So they and their children <WH1121> had the oversight of the gates <WH8179> of the house <WH1004> of the LORD <WH3068>, namely, the house <WH1004> of the tabernacle <WH168>, by wards <WH4931>.
In four <WH702> quarters <WH7307> were the porters <WH7778>, toward the east <WH4217>, west <WH3220>, north <WH6828>, and south <WH5045>.
And their brethren <WH251>, which were in their villages <WH2691>, were to come <WH935> after seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> from time <WH6256> to time <WH6256> with them.

For these Levites <WH3881>, the four <WH702> chief <WH1368> porters <WH7778>, were in their set office <WH530>, and were over the chambers <WH3957> and treasuries <WH214> of the house <WH1004> of God <WH430>. set: or, trust chambers: or, storehouses
And they lodged <WH3885> round about <WH5439> the house <WH1004> of God <WH430>, because the charge <WH4931> was upon them, and the opening <WH4668> thereof every morning <WH1242> pertained to them.

And certain of them had the charge of <WH5921> the ministering <WH5656> vessels <WH3627>, that they should bring them in <WH935> and out <WH3318> by tale <WH4557> <WH4557>. bring: Heb. bring them in by tale, and carry them out by tale

Some of them also were appointed <WH4487> to oversee the vessels <WH3627>, and all the instruments <WH3627> of the sanctuary <WH6944>, and the fine flour <WH5560>, and the wine <WH3196>, and the oil <WH8081>, and the frankincense <WH3828>, and the spices <WH1314>. instruments: or, vessels
And some of the sons <WH1121> of the priests <WH3548> made <WH7543> the ointment <WH4842> of the spices <WH1314>.

And Mattithiah <WH4993>, one of the Levites <WH3881>, who was the firstborn <WH1060> of Shallum <WH7967> the Korahite <WH7145>, had the set office <WH530> over the things that were made <WH4639> in the pans <WH2281>. set: or, trust in: or, on flat plates, or, slices

And other of their brethren <WH251>, of the sons <WH1121> of the Kohathites <WH6956>, were over the shewbread <WH3899> <WH4635>, to prepare <WH3559> it every sabbath <WH7676>. shewbread: Heb. bread of ordering

And these are the singers <WH7891>, chief <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1> of the Levites <WH3881>, who remaining in the chambers <WH3957> were free <WH6362> <WH6359>: for they were employed in that work <WH4399> day <WH3119> and night <WH3915>. they: Heb. upon them
These chief <WH7218> fathers <WH1> of the Levites <WH3881> were chief <WH7218> throughout their generations <WH8435>; these dwelt <WH3427> at Jerusalem <WH3389>.
And in Gibeon <WH1391> dwelt <WH3427> the father <WH1> of Gibeon <WH1391> <WH25>, Jehiel <WH3273>, whose wife's <WH802> name <WH8034> was Maachah <WH4601>:
And his firstborn <WH1060> son <WH1121> Abdon <WH5658>, then Zur <WH6698>, and Kish <WH7027>, and Baal <WH1168>, and Ner <WH5369>, and Nadab <WH5070>,
And Gedor <WH1446>, and Ahio <WH283>, and Zechariah <WH2148>, and Mikloth <WH4732>.
And Mikloth <WH4732> begat <WH3205> Shimeam <WH8043>. And they also dwelt <WH3427> with their brethren <WH251> at Jerusalem <WH3389>, over against their brethren <WH251>.

And Ner <WH5369> begat <WH3205> Kish <WH7027>; and Kish <WH7027> begat <WH3205> Saul <WH7586>; and Saul <WH7586> begat <WH3205> Jonathan <WH3083>, and Malchishua <WH4444>, and Abinadab <WH41>, and Eshbaal <WH792>.
And the son <WH1121> of Jonathan <WH3083> was Meribbaal <WH4807>: and Meribbaal <WH4810> begat <WH3205> Micah <WH4318>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Micah <WH4318> were, Pithon <WH6377>, and Melech <WH4429>, and Tahrea <WH8475>, and Ahaz.
And Ahaz <WH271> begat <WH3205> Jarah <WH3294>; and Jarah <WH3294> begat <WH3205> Alemeth <WH5964>, and Azmaveth <WH5820>, and Zimri <WH2174>; and Zimri <WH2174> begat <WH3205> Moza <WH4162>;
And Moza <WH4162> begat <WH3205> Binea <WH1150>; and Rephaiah <WH7509> his son <WH1121>, Eleasah <WH501> his son <WH1121>, Azel <WH682> his son <WH1121>.

And Azel <WH682> had six <WH8337> sons <WH1121>, whose names <WH8034> are these, Azrikam <WH5840>, Bocheru <WH1074>, and Ishmael <WH3458>, and Sheariah <WH8187>, and Obadiah <WH5662>, and Hanan <WH2605>: these were the sons <WH1121> of Azel <WH682>.
